${ModID}:Rummage.NAME: Rummage
${ModID}:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Draw {!M!|@=a card and reduce its|>1=!${ModID}:m2! cards and reduce their} cost by !M! this turn.

${ModID}:Cardistry.NAME: Cardistry
${ModID}:Cardistry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next card you play this turn is returned to the top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:ConjurePack.NAME: Conjure Pack
${ModID}:ConjurePack.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! Packs available to your run. NL At the start of the next 5 turns, add 2 of its cards to your hand.
${ModID}:ConjurePack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose 1 of !M! Packs available to your run. NL At the start of the next 5 turns, add 2 of its cards to your hand.
